amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.para: City shall mean any city of the metropolitan class, city of the primary class, city of the first class, city of the second class, or village, including any city operated under a home rule charter. City shall also include any group of two or more cities acting in concert under the terms of the Interlocal Cooperation Act or Joint Public Agency Act by means of a properly executed agreement.

crossreference.para: Joint Public Agency Act, see section 13-2501.
